title: Person of Interest - Comic-Con 2013 - Person of Interest Panel - Part: 5
author: CBS
comment: awww Look at Sarah "Can Amy say something please" lol theyre so cute
the muscle line of Sarah's arms just kill me

Well they are very interesting if I do say so myself. I think the cast as a whole is a little bit more animated when she is around. If you get a chance you should definitely watch. There is a pre-screening video from season 2 where the gang is all talking and laughing and Jim, as well as everyone else is having a great time. In a interview with Taraji she said that she and Jim sing old New Edition songs in between takes. She really brings out the best in people from what I have seen!
Yes that is Raphie Cakes.  Great show, great panel.
description: Part 5 of the Person of Interest panel at Comic-Con 2013.  Watch the season premiere of Person of Interest, Tuesday Sept. 24th at 10/9c.  Only CBS!
